mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member ( m_email, m_pw, m_name, m_img, m_nick, m_phone, m_regdate, m_login_type, m_role, m_del_status, m_keep_period ) VALUES ( #{mEmail}, #{mPw}, #{mName}, #{mImg}, #{mNick}, #{mPhone}, NOW(), #{mLoginType}, #{mRole}, #{mDelStatus}, #{mKeepPeriod} )
INSERT INTO address ( m_id, a_zipcode, a_addr1, a_addr2 ) VALUES ( #{mId}, #{aZipcode}, #{aAddr1}, #{aAddr2} )
